nodes.name: leaveStaking

nodes.documentation:
Leaves staking for a user while setting stakedAmount to 0 and transfering staked amount and reward to users address
 @dev leaves staking and deducts total pool by the users reward. early withdrawal fee applied if withdraw is made before earlyWithdrawFeeTime
nodes.name: leaveStakingCompletely

nodes.documentation:
Calculates total potential pending rewards
 @dev Calculates potential reward based on crush per block
nodes.name: totalPendingRewards
pendingReward

nodes.documentation:
transfers the rewards of a user to their address
 @dev calculates users rewards and transfers it out while deducting reward from totalPool
nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation:
compounds the rewards of the caller
 @dev compounds the rewards of the caller add adds it into their staked amount
nodes.name: singleCompound

nodes.documentation:
compounds the rewards of all users in the pool
 @dev compounds the rewards of all users in the pool add adds it into their staked amount while deducting fees
nodes.name: compoundAll

nodes.documentation:
withdraws the staked amount of user in case of emergency.
 @dev drains the staked amount and sets the state variable `stakedAmount` of staking mapping to 0

addRewardToPool(uint256).details: adds the provided amount to `totalPool` state variable

claim().details: calculates users rewards and transfers it out while deducting reward from totalPool

compoundAll().details: compounds the rewards of all users in the pool add adds it into their staked amount while deducting fees

emergencyTotalPoolWithdraw().details: drains the total pool and sets the state variable `totalPool` to 0

emergencyWithdraw().details: drains the staked amount and sets the state variable `stakedAmount` of staking mapping to 0

leaveStaking(uint256).details: leaves staking and deducts total pool by the users reward. early withdrawal fee applied if withdraw is made before earlyWithdrawFeeTime

leaveStakingCompletely().details: leaves staking and deducts total pool by the users reward. early withdrawal fee applied if withdraw is made before earlyWithdrawFeeTime

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingReward(address).details: calculates potential reward for the address provided based on crush per block

params._address: the address to calculate the reward for

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setEarlyWithdrawFee(uint256).details: stores the fee in the state variable `earlyWithdrawFee`

setEarlyWithdrawFeeTime(uint256).details: stores the time in the state variable `earlyWithdrawFeeTime`

singleCompound().details: compounds the rewards of the caller add adds it into their staked amount

totalPendingRewards().details: Calculates potential reward based on crush per block

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claim().notice: transfers the rewards of a user to their address
